invitationExpired.title: Invitation link has expired
invitationExpired.body: The link for accepting the invite has expired. Please contact your administrator to request a new invite to Akyrian.
invitationExpired.subject: Akyrian Invitation Expired
invitationExpired.bodyEmail: My Akyrian invitation has expired and I need your help to re-send an invitation for me. Thank you!
